sys_script_client.description:
Client-side scripts can use the jslog() method to write messages to the JavaScript log. Pass the jslog() method the information you want to appear in the message:
Strings g_form methods g_user properties and methods Variables JavaScript string escape characters such as \n (newline) and \t (tab) will not cause errors in the jslog() method but are ignored.
sys_script_client.name: jslog
